Text: CongratulationsHi Mark Thank you for your voice mail today and congratulations on your position with Transwestern Im sure we will have the opportunity to talk about some deals in the future We were in fact going after a large deal over the last several weeks We heard last week that we were runner up to a very strong bid from Dukes MLP TEPCO Had we gotten it we would have clearly needed additional commercial help I am now reassessing our needs I did get a call today from Brian Kinsey and will followup with him Again congratulations and I enjoyed our visit in Houston Brian

Hanover Response LetterForwarded by Brian BierbachNAEnron on PM Ken Choyce AM To Brian nron Barry NRON Charles nron Shonnie CT cc Subject Hanover Response Letter I apologize if this is the second time youve received this I could not tell who got from what was sent to me Forwarded by Ken ChoyceDENECT on AM Paul K Ludwick PM To Ken Choyce cc Subject Response Letter Ken Here it is we look forward to sitting and discussing all options on Tuesday Any prior discussions on this letter and any intentions are welcome before Tuesday I will call Paul Crestonfinaldoc

RE Frank and GaryI guess we should have run up the score As a concession I am trying to line up of our favorite people as blocking dummies to get Colorado ready for Oregon Brian Original Message From Miller Paul Sent Mon AM To Baldridge Don Bierbach Brian Whitt Mark Varnell Charles Cc Subject FW Frank and Gary SORRY The toughest thing is that now you have to pull for the Huskers to beat Miami to get a split national championship Do you want lend us some defensive lineman Check out the attachment Paul Original Message From BrianO mailtoBrianO Sent Saturday December PM To Miller Paul Subject FW Frank and Gary Huskers rule Forwarded by Brian ONeillWright Line on PM Rathbun Treyse L estcom on AM To Gonzales Keith J estcom Baack Todd Brian ONeillWright right Line Jud Hunter cc Subject FW Frank and Gary Congratsjpg Treyse Rathbun Corporate Designer Omaha NE
